pageContext.claim: “So it should have been — so then the last one, on Tuesday — Tuesday I did another one: 'We condemn in the strongest possible terms this egregious display of hatred, bigotry and violence. It has no place in America.'”
pageContext.analysis: Actually, these were from his carefully crafted statement on Aug. 14, a Monday. The second day, Aug. 15, Trump made unscripted remarks that echoed the "both sides" narrative and created a new firestorm.
